data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Phuket to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phuket, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Phuket.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 3,880 believers in Phuket to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 600,000 souls living in the state of Phuket with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Hui, Muslim Chinese people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Hui, Muslim Chinese people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Hui, Muslim Chinese people is yours.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Phuket, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Phuket, Thailand know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.section_summary:
the state of Phuket, Thailand has a population of 600,000.

We estimate Phuket has 3,880 people who might know Jesus, 3,960 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 592,160 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 3,880 believers in the state of Phuket.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.
